attributes.action: Abolish the right of MPs to employ family members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of the recent case of Derek Conway, MP, who gave taxpayers' money to his sons under the pretence that they were 'working' for him.

The whole system is open to abuse and should be abolished.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
